course_title: Special Topics: Music: Cultures & Arts of Indonesia
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 18 / Seats Avail: 16Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: This course introduces students to the practice of Central Javanese gamelan, and cultural studies around the tradition of music-making in Central Java. Throughout the semester, students will combine the practice of gamelan, reading literatures and class discussions as a way to examine and contextualize Javanese gamelan as a cultural practice. Literatures explored in this course come from anthropology, history, theatre studies, dance studies and ethnomusicology. Assignments include reflection journals, midterm exam and final performance.
course_description: Selected topics in Music. May be repeated when topic varies.
sections: Class Nbr: 5689, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: M. Ishiguro, Status: Open
